0010100001110000 1110101011110001 1 -> sum: 0001001101100010, cout: 1
1011111001010110 1100001111110001 1 -> sum: 1000001001001000, cout: 1
0101011100000010 1010110000000001 1 -> sum: 0000001100000100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
